title: Ticket #7174: timestamps in job_queue.log end transaction events
description:
When investigation problems with the schedd, it would sometimes be nice to have timestamps in the job_queue.log file. This would be pretty easy to achieve if we allowed an optional comment on the EndTransaction event and put the timestamp in the comment.

So for event type 106, the event may be optionally followed by a #, in which case everything up to the next \n will be valid.

something like this 

fragment of job_queue.log
105
103 1076.9 BytesRecvd 0.0
103 1076.9 BytesSent 0.0
103 1076.9 CommittedSlotTime 125.0
103 1076.9 CommittedTime 125
103 1076.9 CpusProvisioned 1
103 1076.9 CPUsUsage 0.125
103 1076.9 DiskProvisioned 72112494
103 1076.9 DiskUsage_RAW 20
103 1076.9 DiskUsage 20
103 1076.9 ExitBySignal false
103 1076.9 ExitCode 0
103 1076.9 ImageSize_RAW 4784
103 1076.9 ImageSize 5000
103 1076.9 JobCurrentStartExecutingDate 1564509132
103 1076.9 LastJobLeaseRenewal 1564509252
103 1076.9 MemoryProvisioned 2032
103 1076.9 MemoryUsage ((ResidentSetSize + 1023) / 1024)
103 1076.9 NumJobCompletions 1
103 1076.9 NumJobStarts 1
103 1076.9 RemoteSysCpu 0.0
103 1076.9 RemoteUserCpu 0.0
103 1076.9 ResidentSetSize_RAW 4772
103 1076.9 ResidentSetSize 5000
103 1076.9 TerminationPending true
106 # 2019-07-30T12:54:12.379843
105
103 1076.9 LastJobStatus 2
103 1076.9 JobStatus 4
103 1076.9 EnteredCurrentStatus 1564509252
103 1076.9 LastSuspensionTime 0
106 # 2019-07-30T12:54:12.442188 NONDURABLE

In support of this, it would be helpful to add code to the stable branch that tolerates the comment on the EndTransaction event even though it will never be written to by the stable version.
remarks:
2019-Oct-22 14:40:04 by johnkn:
no version history for this change, it is not user visible
derived_tickets: #7175   ignore comments on job_queue.log end transaction events
check_ins: 2019-Jul-31 09:40   Check-in [57530]: for #7174, timestamp EndTransaction events in the job_queue.log using the comment field in the event this behavior is enabled by a new knob SCHEDD_JOB_QUEUE_TIMESTAMPS which is off by default ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
